publications.title: CineMit
publications.description: CineMit is the dedicated group movie meeting app for organizing and watching movies shown at theaters together

publications.title: Real YT Music
publications.description: RYTM is an application that enables users to search for videos and play them without initial advertisements. Additionally, users can listen to the video in a compact window, facilitating simultaneous navigation across other applications

publications.title: FlashApp
publications.description: Learning aid application through the creation of various decks of flashcards

publications.title: EmergeMobile
publications.description: EmergeMobile is a web application utilized by French forestry professionals, encompassing a web interface, an Android application, and dedicated APIs
